explain: to have the same idea or opinion
to not do what is expected
to come out of an egg
a wormlike thing that hatches from an egg
the stage between larva and adult when an insect changes form
a round, soft fruit with fuzzy skin that is sweet and juicy inside
a tiny part of a plant that can grow into a new plant when put in soil
to win against someone in a game or competition
to notice something through touch, or to have an emotion inside you
statement: The assistant is helping to put up this sign.
assistant
The people agreed that this road needed a stop sign.
agreed
This sign reminds children to be polite, or nice, to others.
polite
The sign failed to keep the dog off the grass.
failed
All baby birds hatch from eggs.
hatch
The magician made the person disappear!
disappear
The butterfly larva hatches from an egg.
larva
A larva grows and sheds its skin, and then it turns into a pupa.
pupa
She bit into the peach and juice dripped down her chin.
peach
He dropped each seed into a small hole in the ground and covered it with dirt.
seed
Our team worked very hard to beat the other school in the final game.
beat
She reached into the bag to feel if the fruit was soft enough to eat.
feel
